definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)

sentences.english: I am a European, and one returns to one's roots .
sentences.chinese: 我是个欧洲人，总要叶落归根。

sentences.english: She always thinks that she was born unlucky, and could not encounter main chances.
sentences.chinese: 她总觉得自己命薄，赶不上好机会。

sentences.english: That's a long way off but it's not too early to make plans.
sentences.chinese: 尽管来日方长，但是及早打算总没错。

sentences.english: Total first-time enrolment of international graduate students rose 12 per cent this year.
sentences.chinese: 新录取的国际研究生总人数今年增加了12%。

sentences.english: She had too little faith in mankind not to know that they were erring .
sentences.chinese: 她对男人们没有信心，知道他们总要犯错误的。

sentences.english: The increase of gross price level is the sacrifice a country makes for exercizing its function.
sentences.chinese: 价格总水平的上涨是国家为实现其职能所付出的代价。

sentences.english: I hadn't seen Gordy in years, but the boy always liked to showboat .
sentences.chinese: 我已经很多年没有见到高迪了，但那小伙总喜欢炫耀。

sentences.english: He has been pressing to return to China to advocate for greater cultural and religious freedoms for his followers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直努力回到天朝为他的信徒争取文化和总角子有。

sentences.english: Well, you're not coming empty-handed, are you?
sentences.chinese: 天啊，你总不会空着手来，是吧。

sentences.english: Thy beauty and thy years full well befits.
sentences.chinese: 你的美貌与年龄总相宜。

sentences.english: So far, a total of 327 contacts have been identified.
sentences.chinese: 迄今确定的接触者总人数为327人。

sentences.english: Why could I never please them?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我总不能让他们高兴呢？

sentences.english: Regardless of the difficulties encountered in life, has the world's way out.
sentences.chinese: 无论人生遇到什么困难，世界总有路可走。

sentences.english: I'm always upset when I don't get mail.
sentences.chinese: 我接不到晌何邮件时总嗜心烦意乱。

sentences.english: Aim To study optimial technology for autogenesis -enzyme hydrolysis of total flavonoid glycoside in scutellaria.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黄芩自生酶催化水解总黄酮苷的工艺条件。

sentences.english: Total serum testosterone was assayed by Chemoluminescence immunoassay.
sentences.chinese: 化学发光免疫分析法测血清总睾酮。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
